card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Eternal Sign
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Put a non-evolution darkness or fire creature that costs 7 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Reload Charger
card.text: ■ You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. ■ Charger

card.name: Savage, Forbidden U
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a D2 Field or a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Deadly Highway, Runaway of ZERO
card.text: ■ ZERO ■ ''(Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.)'' ■ D2 Wrap

card.name: ZERO Hand
card.text: ■ ZERO ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Nurgle, Forbidden X
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks and isn't blocked, destroy this creature. Then destroy the attacking creature.
